issue.title: [CF 655] Condition unit spec
issue.body:
I was wondering if it would be possible to add a condition based on a unit spec, by tracking buffs/casted spells. Is this something you might add in the future or does something similar already exists?


> Posted by CurseForge user daniel1992 | Imported from CurseForge issue #655 | Raw

comments.body:
Probably not something that I would implement myself, simply because this would have to be extremely complex, would have to require constant maintenance, and I simply don't have the time anymore for either of those things.

If you can interest a third party in developing something like this, then all the more power to you, but I won't be implementing something like this myself.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
